attributes.action: Make people stop littering other peoples gardens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day people get litter in our gardens. I say stop, as it destroys habitats and burns flowers, if ciggerates are dropped. Many people find it annoying and dis-respectful, so please Mr Blair, atually listen.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
